name: Mendell & Oberer
biography: Pierre Mendell was born in 1929 in Essen, North Rhine-Westphalia and died in 2008 in Munich, Bavaria.  He studied graphic design with Armin Hoffmann at the School of Design in Basel, Switzerland. In 1961, he founded the Studio Mendell & Oberer in Munich, Germany, with Klaus Oberer, born in 1937 in Swtzerland. Mendell & Oberer parted company in 2000.
